snippet.title: Primo Richards: Detroit's #1 Detective - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the announcement trailer for the upcoming visual novel/adventure game: Primo Richards, which will be released on PC/Android/web formats. 

This is an adventure/visual novel detective game in which you must solve a major murder case, grow and maintain relationships with your friends, and solve puzzles. There will be approximately 3 hours of content per case, and multiple cases plan on being released per year.

The first demo for the game will be available by 12/17, and will provide approximately 30 minutes of gameplay. The full game will be released circa January 2024. Check updates here on the week of 12/10/23 to get download and web links.
